author: jsong
msg: Fix for CR196256: GTLF DTD file needs to be accessible to the world.  By default, TCH will use a DTD located on the Apache server.  I've also added an option to use a local DTD file if the user cannot reach the Apache site:  set -Dgtlf.dtd.use.remote=false

author: akarasulu
msg: making interfaces derive from SchemaObject and more docos about this pkg

author: ajack
msg: 2) Can't throw UnicodeDecodeError, so use RuntimeError

author: akarasulu
msg: using BiSyChecker as the default in BaseSyntax
